DOC.detailed_description: All premenopausal woman refer outpatient clinic Department Endocrinology 1997 onward referral diagnosis hirsutism and/or PCOS include clinical database . The patient fulfill Rotterdam criterion PCOS clinical/biochemical hyperandrogenemia . Routine evaluation include medical history , clinical examination , transvaginal ultrasound ( US ) , fast blood sample . Cycle history record patient use standard scheme prepared hirsute patient . Blood test include androgen , LH , FSH , prolactin , lipid profile . OGTT ACTH perform high risk patient
